title: Provided that, for a scheme were clubbing has been permitted by the earlier DCR, the same can be continue for the slum dwellers who become eligible at latter stage
clause_text: Provided that, for a scheme were clubbing has been permitted by the earlier DCR, the same can be continue for the slum dwellers who become eligible at latter stage.
section: Payments to be made to SRA and Instalments:

source_pdf.text_snippet: Provided that, for a scheme were clubbing has been permitted by the earlier DCR, the same can be continue for the slum dwellers who become eligible at latter stage.
